responseTemplate.errorNoQuestionsAnswers: No questions and answers were found.
responseTemplate.rowTableInfo: A row table is most useful when copy and pasting into a spreadsheet.
responseTemplate.confirmReceiptInfo: Copy the code below and paste it into the Confirm Receipt of Responses page in the website.

responseAggregatedTemplate.title: Form responses: combined table of selected responses
responseAggregatedTemplate.officialReceipt: Official receipt and record of responses
responseAggregatedTemplate.needToVerify: You will need this receipt later to verify all responses made it safely from GC forms to your computer.
responseAggregatedTemplate.useTheCopy: Use the “Copy receipt codes” button to copy all the codes to your clipboard then paste them into GC Forms. This lets us know that a full set of records made it safely to your computer. These official records should be saved in accordance to your departments retention policies.

copyCodes.title: Confirm and delete responses from GC Forms
copyCodes.description: Once you've checked the downloaded responses, and are ready to delete these from GC Forms, copy and paste the receipt codes. This helps us know when responses have been transferred to you so we can remove the data from our system.

dataList.title: Form responses: data list of each selected response

dataClassification.retainCopy: Retain this copy in accordance to your retention policy.
